bibl.title: Greek Contracts belonging to the Late Ptolemaic Tebtynis Grapheion Archive?
bibl.note: The bilingual archive of a village grapheion. - The Greek contracts from the ""first batch"". - ""Revised double documents"". - Connections between the Greek contracts and the grapheion archive. - Greek six-witness contracts drawn up at the village grapheion? - Contracts 1-3 to be excluded? - Other Greek texts belonging to the grapheion archive? - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: Francisca A.J. Hoogendijk, Greek Contracts belonging to the Late Ptolemaic Tebtynis Grapheion Archive?

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 63-74, 2 pll.

The bilingual archive of a village grapheion. - The Greek contracts from the ""first batch"". - ""Revised double documents"". - Connections between the Greek contracts and the grapheion archive. - Greek six-witness contracts drawn up at the village grapheion? - Contracts 1-3 to be excluded? - Other Greek texts belonging to the grapheion archive? - Conclusion.
